title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official repo: the CLI tool that downloads, builds and serves Llama-2, CodeLlama, Mistral, etc. on macOS/Linux with a single command.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama—chat, embed, pull, push models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same API surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package letting you use any Ollama model as an LLM or embeddings provider.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama with multi-model chats, code highlighting, RAG uploads.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Terminal UI (TUI) wrapper around Ollama for interactive chats without leaving the console.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS-Code extension that turns any Ollama model into an inline GitHub-Copilot-like assistant.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with Spring-Starter and Android examples.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for chatting and pulling models from Ollama.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Lightweight Rust crate providing async/await bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset—use Ollama models as generators or embedders in RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: Docker Compose, K8s Helm, GitHub Actions, function-calling examples.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node-selector.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CPU & CUDA) plus compose files for quick local or server installs.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that lets servers chat with any Ollama model via slash commands.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt app that adds /ollama slash command for private or channel chats.

title: ollama-models
summary: Registry info and community-submitted Modelfiles for Llama-3, Phi-3, Gemma, etc.

title: ollama-gpt4all-ui
summary: GPT4All UI branch that can optionally back-end onto Ollama for higher performance on Mac/Linux.

title: ollama-reddit
summary: Active subreddit for announcements, troubleshooting and showcase of Ollama projects.

title: ollama-hackernews-discussion
summary: Hacker News thread discussing the launch of Ollama v0.1.30 with tool-use/function-calling beta.
